question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Broad Beach Road Shoulder Repairs, Latigo Canyon Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements.
evidence_answer: Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements
